snippet: The judge in the trial of Gilberto Valle, accused of plotting to kidnap and cook women, said some grisly images and other evidence could prejudice jurors.
abstract: Judge Paul G Gardephe of Federal District Court in Manhattan rules that jurors in trial of New York City Police Officer Gilberto Valle, charged with plotting to kidnap, cook and eat women, will not be shown certain graphic images and other evidence that could prejudice them against the defendant.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the trial of Gilberto Valle, accused of plotting to kidnap and cook women, said some grisly images and other evidence could prejudice jurors.

headline.seo: Judge Bans Some Images From Trial of Officer Accused in Plot to Cook Women
headline.main: Judge Bans Some Images From Trial of Officer
headline.print_headline: Judge Bans Some Images From Trial Of Officer
